title: Roger Craig receives long-awaited Hall of Fame enshrinement, via the process that left out Bill Belichick

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Roger Craig receives long-awaited Hall of Fame enshrinement, via the process that left out Bill Belichick
sources.description: The former Niners running back was the lone name to emerge from a five-man competition in the Hall of Fame's voting process.
